summary: Provides a set of composite command‑line parsers that combine lower‑level argument parsers to interpret, validate, and document host configuration options for various host types used by the Ansible test CLI.
business_intent: Enable consistent parsing, validation, and documentation of host‑related command‑line arguments (controller, Docker, network inventory/remote, origin, POSIX remote/SSH, and Windows inventory/remote) so that the test framework can correctly construct host configuration objects.
